alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 11:33AM EDT until August 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Coastal Taylor and Coastal Dixie Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Water levels will result in minor inundation of 1 to 3 feet above ground around the time of high tide that will flood low lying beach access roads, and beach areas not protected by sea walls. High tides are around 3 am ET on Thursday morning and 3 pm ET on Thursday afternoon.
info.instruction: Flooded areas may remain along the immediate coast, especially within areas most impacted by storm surge from Hurricane Idalia. If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Follow the advice of law enforcement and emergency management and do not enter flooded areas.
